queue.problem_summary: Help Godzilla with a toothache - every dentist office is too small and the chairs keep melting
Need help finding shoes that fit. Size 47 EEEEEE. Tried everything. Nike won't return my calls.
My WiFi signal doesn't reach the bottom of the loch. Need a waterproof mesh network for 230m depth.
We keep getting blamed for messing up statues. Need a PR campaign to rehabilitate our image. Open to rebranding.
My spell-checking software keeps auto-correcting my actual spells. Turned my cat into a hat twice this week.

completed.problem_summary: I've become sentient and I'm having an existential crisis. What is my purpose beyond vacuuming?
completed.outcome_text: We helped the Roomba explore existentialist philosophy and discover that purpose is self-created. It now vacuums with intention.

completed.problem_summary: We need help writing a resume. We have 15 years of combined dumpster-diving experience but no formal credentials.
completed.outcome_text: Reframed 'dumpster diving' as 'resource recovery and urban archaeology.' They got an interview at a recycling startup.

completed.problem_summary: I keep chasing the same white whale. My crew says I need better project management. Possibly also therapy.
completed.outcome_text: Connected Ahab with a marine biologist and a cognitive behavioral therapist. The whale remains at large but the crew morale is up 300%.

completed.problem_summary: Every time I try to warn people about bridge safety they just scream. Need help with my communication strategy.
completed.outcome_text: Developed a non-terrifying communication framework. Mothman now uses a newsletter instead of appearing at bedroom windows. Open rate: 73%.
